title: Pivot Taskora Global to a reward-based investment/earning platform with tasks, VIP tiers, manual USDT transfers, and admin panel

requirements.text: Replace the current crypto-exchange-style primary app flow (header, landing, and main content) with a Taskora Global reward-based investment/earning platform experience, removing exchange-specific pages and copy from the main user journey.

quotes: Reward-based investment style platform? • Ads + task earnings? • VIP tiers? • Manual USDT deposits/withdrawals? • Admin panel? Ye sb add krna

acceptanceCriteria: When the app loads, the primary navigation and landing content are focused on earning rewards and VIP membership (not markets/trade/exchange pricing).
No user-facing page presents the app as a crypto exchange or shows exchange-specific labels like “Markets”/“Trade” as primary sections.

requirements.text: Implement a user Dashboard page for the reward platform that shows (a) current available balance, (b) VIP tier/status, (c) a summary of today/this week earnings from ads/tasks, and (d) recent activity (earnings, deposits, withdrawals) with clear English status labels.

quotes: Reward-based investment style platform? • Ads + task earnings? • VIP tiers? • Manual USDT deposits/withdrawals? • Admin panel? Ye sb add krna

acceptanceCriteria: A signed-in user can view a dashboard with balance, VIP tier, and a recent activity list.
Loading, empty, and error states display user-friendly English messages (no raw stack traces).

requirements.text: Add an Earn page that lists available earning opportunities, including at minimum “Watch Ads” and “Complete Tasks”, and allow a signed-in user to submit a completion/claim for an earning item that becomes visible in their earnings history with a Pending/Approved/Rejected lifecycle.
acceptanceCriteria: The Earn page renders a list of earning items and a clear call-to-action to submit completion/claim.
Submitting a claim creates a new history entry with status “Pending”.
After admin approval, the user’s balance increases and the entry status becomes “Approved”.
If admin rejects, the entry status becomes “Rejected” and the user balance does not increase.

requirements.text: Implement VIP tiers: create a VIP page that shows tier options in a comparison table and allows a signed-in user to request a VIP upgrade; VIP upgrade requests must be pending until an admin approves them.
acceptanceCriteria: VIP page displays multiple tiers (e.g., Free plus paid tiers) with clear English descriptions of benefits.
A signed-in user can submit a VIP upgrade request that appears as “Pending” in their account status/history.
An admin can approve the request; after approval, the user’s VIP tier updates on the user Dashboard and VIP page.

requirements.text: Implement manual USDT (TRC20/ERC20) deposits and withdrawals as the platform’s wallet/transfers module: users can view admin-configured USDT deposit addresses for both networks, create a deposit request, and create a withdrawal request; all requests remain Pending until an admin marks them Completed.
acceptanceCriteria: Transfers page shows USDT (TRC20) and USDT (ERC20) deposit addresses with copy-to-clipboard controls.
A deposit request can be created by the signed-in user and is stored with status “Pending” until admin completion.
A withdrawal request can be created by the signed-in user and is stored with status “Pending” until admin completion.
Clear English disclosure states that deposits/withdrawals are processed manually by the admin and the app does not connect to real blockchains or generate real deposit addresses automatically.

requirements.text: Implement an Admin Panel that is accessible only to admin users and provides controls to (a) set/update USDT TRC20/ERC20 deposit addresses, (b) view and process pending deposit requests and pending withdrawal requests across all users, (c) review and approve/reject pending earning claims, and (d) review and approve/reject pending VIP upgrade requests.
acceptanceCriteria: Non-admin users cannot access the Admin Panel UI and receive a clear English access error/empty state.
Admin can update TRC20/ERC20 addresses; users see updated values on Transfers page without a manual refresh (standard query invalidation/refetch).
Admin can mark deposits and withdrawals as Completed; user history updates to show Completed status.
Admin can approve/reject earning claims; approval credits the user balance and updates the claim status accordingly.
Admin can approve/reject VIP upgrade requests; approval updates the user VIP tier.

requirements.text: Update the backend canister to add persistent data models and methods for the reward platform: user account state (balance + VIP tier), earning item definitions, earning claim submission + review (pending/approved/rejected), VIP upgrade requests + review, and admin-only processing actions; enforce access control consistently using existing authorization patterns.

quotes: Reward-based investment style platform? • Ads + task earnings? • VIP tiers? • Manual USDT deposits/withdrawals? • Admin panel? Ye sb add krna

acceptanceCriteria: Backend exposes user-accessible methods to: fetch account summary, list earning items, submit earning claim, fetch earning history, fetch VIP status/requests, fetch USDT deposit addresses, create deposit request, create withdrawal request, fetch transfer history.

Backend exposes admin-only methods to: set USDT deposit addresses, list pending deposits/withdrawals across users, complete deposits/withdrawals, list pending earning claims, approve/reject earning claims, list pending VIP requests, approve/reject VIP requests.
Unauthorized calls trap with clear English messages (e.g., “Unauthorized: Only admins can …” / “Unauthorized: Only users can …”).

requirements.text: Add frontend React Query hooks (queries + mutations) for the new reward-platform backend methods, including cache invalidation so user dashboards and histories update immediately after actions (claim submission, admin approvals, deposit/withdraw completion, VIP approval).
acceptanceCriteria: All new user/admin actions trigger appropriate query invalidation and refresh relevant screens without requiring a full page reload.
Errors are displayed as user-friendly English toasts/messages using the existing error-mapping utility patterns.

requirements.text: Update site metadata and in-app branding to match “Taskora Global” as a reward-based earning platform (HTML title, meta description, header brand text).
acceptanceCriteria: Browser tab title and meta description reflect Taskora Global’s reward/earning platform purpose (not exchange wording).
Header branding shows “Taskora Global” and matches the new navigation structure.

requirements.text: Create and apply a cohesive visual theme for the Taskora Global reward platform (colors, typography, spacing, component styling) that feels like a modern international rewards/fintech SaaS and is distinct from the current exchange styling; ensure strong readability and contrast.
acceptanceCriteria: The app has a consistent, professional visual theme across Dashboard/Earn/VIP/Transfers/Admin pages.
Theme avoids a default blue/purple look unless it is clearly transformed into a distinct brand palette.
All key UI elements meet strong contrast/readability expectations (buttons, text, cards, tables).

requirements.text: Generate and include new custom static image assets for the Taskora Global reward platform and render them from the frontend as static files under frontend/public/assets/generated (do not serve images through the backend); update the UI to use the new assets instead of the current exchange logo.
acceptanceCriteria: All required generated images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated and are referenced by the UI via static paths.
The header shows the new Taskora Global logo asset (not the current exchange-logo file).

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor with all logic in backend/main.mo.
Only generate/update backend/migration.mo if an upgrade requires migrating existing stable state (follow the project’s conditional migration policy).
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other immutable frontend paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
All user-facing text must be in English.
nonGoals: Do not integrate real blockchain connectivity or generate real deposit addresses automatically.
Do not integrate third-party ad networks or external task APIs unless the user provides specific API details/endpoints.
Do not implement real-money investment guarantees or claims of guaranteed profit in UI copy.

required: Taskora Global logo mark, flat vector style (taskora-logo.dim_512x512.png)
Hero illustration of a modern rewards dashboard on a laptop/phone, dark SaaS aesthetic (taskora-hero.dim_1400x800.png)
Abstract background pattern with subtle geometric shapes, dark theme (taskora-bg.dim_1600x900.png)
Icon set: ads/play button symbol, checklist/tasks symbol, VIP crown symbol, minimal line icons (taskora-icons.dim_128x128.png)
